name: Data Automation
description: Python script that automates the fetching of public exam results from a Universityâ€™s website. Obtained more than 500k rows of raw data. After that, I had to clean the data and save it into a database on a Google Cloud Virtual machine using Docker and Postgresql. In the end, I was able to analyze the data and get some insights from it.
